metadata.title: Story 5-1: Story Detail Page with Video Carousel Implementation

user-story.i-want: to view a comprehensive story page with video carousel (3-7 clips)
user-story.so-that: I can explore the artifact from multiple perspectives, understand its creation journey, and make offers or participate in auctions

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Complete story page layout with video carousel (3-7 clips with dot navigation), section navigation (Overview, Process Timeline as vertical-scroll development journal, Materials, Notes, Location), and sticky "I want this" CTA with smooth scroll-to-offers functionality.
HLS video playback with adaptive streaming, watermark protection, customizable controls (play/pause, volume, fullscreen, captions), and mobile-optimized gesture controls.
WCAG 2.1 AA compliant accessibility including semantic HTML structure, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, captions for video content, and high contrast mode support.
Content protection with signed URLs, watermarking enforcement, and secure media delivery preventing unauthorized downloads and screen capture attempts.
Share functionality with expiring deep links, social media integration, and analytics tracking for share events and user engagement metrics.
Performance optimization with video preloading strategies, adaptive bitrate streaming, lazy loading for non-critical content, and efficient state management.
Comprehensive error handling for video playback failures, network issues, content protection violations, and graceful degradation with user-friendly error messages.
Analytics instrumentation for story views, video engagement metrics, section interactions, CTA clicks, and share events with proper parameter tracking.

task.description: Implement story page scaffold with app shell integration and navigation parameters (story_id, source tracking) using Go Router type-safe navigation
Design and implement section components for Overview, Process Timeline (development journal), Materials & Tools, Notes, and Location using shared design tokens and component library
Implement sticky CTA section with "I want this" button that scrolls to Offers & Auction section with smooth animation and visual feedback
SECURITY CRITICAL: Implement HLS video player with secure streaming and content protection
Build comprehensive video player controls with custom styling and accessibility support
Add mobile-optimized gesture controls for video playback
ACCESSIBILITY CRITICAL: Implement WCAG 2.1 AA compliance throughout the story page
Implement video accessibility features including captions, transcripts, and audio descriptions
Create responsive design that works across all device sizes and orientations
SECURITY CRITICAL: Implement comprehensive content protection for video and story assets
Build secure media pipeline integration with CDN and storage backend
Implement comprehensive share functionality with deep link generation and social media integration
Add social engagement features and user interaction tracking
Optimize video loading and playback performance with adaptive strategies
Implement efficient state management and data loading patterns
Implement comprehensive analytics tracking for story interactions and user behavior
Create analytics for share functionality and social engagement
Implement comprehensive error handling for all story page scenarios
Add edge case handling and boundary condition management

prerequisites.prerequisite: Story 01.1 – Bootstrap Repository and Flutter App
Story 4.1 – Home Feed Implementation (navigational entry and shared video playback primitives)
Story 6.1 – Media Pipeline Content Protection (signed URLs, watermarking)
Story 9.1 – Offer Submission Flow (CTA destination contracts)
